name: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing DX
name_original: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing DX
description: Out of pure boredom, our hero Luigi decides to go on a quest to search for Nothing. Inspired in the original SMB1 for NES with some new gimmicks, dialogues and other stuff. Originally made in 2013, ported this year to GameMaker Studio with many fixes, music remakes and overall accurate NES feel.
